originalText.text: I like this location, and not to mention the spinning bike.Only on on the second floor. Hopefully they will bring  more.People at the front desk are very nice. And last but not least, the personal trainer, Shackim, is a very friendly an nice person. Please forgive me if I didn’t spelled your name right. Promise I will correct it very soon.

originalText.text: Another gym, another review. I migrated here like many other Brooklynites, stranded without a gym in the borough. I like this gym. It has a lot of stairs, but, hey, it's a gym anyway. (There's an elevator.) The staff is friendly and helpful. However, they ignore the unacceptable behavior of a few members, hence the one star. One guy, a member, "heats up" the sauna by pouring water into his mouth and spitting on the heater. It stinks up the place, and it's a health hazard. Several other members go into the sauna and steam room without showering, with their clothes AND shoes on, which is also a health hazard. They bring their phone along because of course. Some members and I said something here and there, achieving nothing, but it shouldn't be our responsibility to ensure stuff like that doesn't happen. A few members make the whole place as trashy as they come.

text.text: Another gym, another review. I migrated here like many other Brooklynites, stranded without a gym in the borough. I like this gym. It has a lot of stairs, but, hey, it's a gym anyway. A few members make the whole place as trashy as they come.

originalText.text: The gym itself is fine, but the membership team, led by the general manager Akeem, is very difficult to work with and is very deceptive with their billing policies. I went in to cancel my subscription over a year back and they instead put a freeze on my account - not acknowledging that there would be a monthly charge associated with the freeze. Without providing any notification, they unfroze my account three months later and began to charge me monthly. When I alerted the gym to the error, they explained that it was within their right to unfreeze my account without any notification. When I tried to resolve the matter, it took weeks to get responses from the team, and the issue was never resolved. The gym itself is serviceable (though in need of some renovations), but I would advise against becoming a member of this gym. For a gym that claims to pride itself in customer service, I would say they fell substantially short of providing a positive experience. Just read any of the last few reviews and you'll get a sense of how often they seem to mishandle - and deceptively bill - their customers.

originalText.text:
THIS PARTICULAR NYCS IS IN A VERY NICE LOCATION, A VARIETY OF FOOD,  THE MUSEUM OF NATURAL HISTORY IS  NEAR,  THE 1 TRAIN IS A BLOCK AWAY, GREAT NEIGHBORHOOD...
THE FACILITY HAS 5 FLOORS, AS WELL AS A WORKING  ELEVATOR,  THE 4TH FLOOR IS HAS UPPER BODY AND  3 LEG MACHINES A BIT SNUG, BUT AS FAR AS I KNOW THEY DONT GET LARGE  CROWDS HERE, WHICH IS GOOD, ALL TRAINING  LEVELS HAVE GREAT NATURAL LIGHT,
THERE IS A BIG ROOM THEY USE ON THE 5TH FLOOR FOR CLASSES, AND STRETCHING,  IF A CLASS IS IN SESSION  THEY HAVE OTHER STRETCH AREAS 2ND FLOOR, HAS TREADMILLS  AND MORE UPPER  BODY MACHINES 2 STRETCH  AREAS , CABLES  COUPLE OF LEG CURL MACHINES , IT IS A PRETTY DECENT GYM ...
PROBLEM NO PAPER TOWELS  TO DRY HANDS OR TO WIPE DOWN THE MACHINE AFTER SPRAYING IT WITH SANITIZER, ALSO NOT ENOUGH  MAINTENANCE  WORKERS , LOCKER ROOMS ARE PRETTY  O.K,  BATHROOM  NEEDS CONSISTENT ATTENTION,  BUT  SHOWERS NEED TO BE RENOVATED,  BUT WILL GET THE JOB DONE, ...
BUT A BONUS THEY ARE THE ONLY FITNESS FACILITY I BEEN TO THAT HAS A STEAM ROOM  AND A SAUNA, SUPER  COOL TAKE ADVANTAGE  OF THAT, I LIKE THE FACILITY  OVER ALL AND I WOULD  COME BACK.... CHECK IT OUT FOR YOURSELF

originalText.text: I like this location the best. The AC works well and I always managed to get space at the squat rack (I guess the UWS is not a fan?). Really close to the subway line too!
